https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oxCjrMew7bvaW7tzD9Ip4f658M1.jpg On November 15, 2013, the world came together to grant one 5-year-old leukemia patient his wish to be Batman for a day. "Batkid Begins" looks at why and how this phenomenon took place, becoming one of the biggest "good news" stories of all time. Batkid Begins
